languages.text: {n}Время, проведенное в Темном городе, отпечаталось на лике Кибеллы мрачной маской несмерти: кожа посинела, словно у трупа, а священные стигматы, с яростью вскрытые клинком в момент умопомрачения, разбухли и воспалились.{/n} "Я... могу сражаться. Не бойся вынуть сей клинок из ножен, когда он понадобится".

{n}The time spent in the Dark City has left its mark on Kibellah. The life has left her eyes, her face is grim, and her skin has taken on a pale corpse-like pallor. Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."
languages.original_text: {n}Время, проведенное в Темном городе, отпечаталось на лике Кибеллы мрачной маской несмерти: кожа посинела, словно у трупа, а священные стигматы, с яростью вскрытые клинком в момент умопомрачения, разбухли и воспалились.{/n} "Я... могу сражаться. Не бойся вынуть сей клинок из ножен, когда он понадобится".

traits.locale_text: {n}The time spent in the Dark City has left an imprint on Kibellah's features, turning them into a grim mask of undeath: her skin has taken on a corpse-like bluish tinge, and her ritualistic cuts, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to draw this sword when you need it."

I can fight. Do not hesitate to draw this sword when you need it."

Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."

languages.text: {n}Su estancia en la Ciudad Siniestra ha causado estragos en Kibellah. La vida se ha esfumado de sus ojos, su expresión es severa y su piel ha adquirido una lividez cadavérica. Sus heridas rituales, que ha vuelto a abrirse en un arrebato frenético, están enrojecidas e inflamadas.{/n} «Yo... aún puedo luchar. No dude en desenfundar esta hoja cuando la necesite».
languages.original_text: {n}The time spent in the Dark City has left its mark on Kibellah. The life has left her eyes, her face is grim, and her skin has taken on a pale corpse-like pallor. Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su estancia en la Ciudad Siniestra ha causado estragos en Kibellah. La vida se ha esfumado de sus ojos, su expresión es severa y su piel ha adquirido una lividez cadavérica. Sus heridas rituales, que ha vuelto a abrirse en un arrebato frenético, están enrojecidas e inflamadas.{/n} «Yo... aún puedo luchar. No dude en desenfundar esta hoja cuando la necesite».

languages.text: {n}仄暗き都で過ごした時間がキベラに爪痕を残していた。彼女の目からは生気が消え、顔は険しくなり、肌は青白い死体のような青白さを帯びている。狂乱の中で新たに作った儀式の傷は腫れ上がり、炎症を起こしている。{/n}「私は…私は戦える。必要があれば、遠慮なくこの刃を鞘から抜いてちょうだい」
languages.original_text: {n}The time spent in the Dark City has left its mark on Kibellah. The life has left her eyes, her face is grim, and her skin has taken on a pale corpse-like pallor. Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."

traits.locale_text: {n}仄暗き都で過ごした時間がキベラに爪痕を残していた。彼女の目からは生気が消え、顔は険しくなり、肌は青白い死体のような青白さを帯びている。狂乱の中で新たに作った儀式の傷は腫れ上がり、炎症を起こしている。{/n}「私は…私は戦える。必要があれば、遠慮なくこの刃を鞘から抜いてちょうだい」

languages.text: {n}黑暗之城的遭遇在绮贝菈身上留下了烙印。她的目光已经失去了生机，表情无比严峻，皮肤宛如尸体一般苍白。在狂乱之中，她在皮肤上刻下了新的伤口，如今这些伤口已经肿胀、发炎。{/n}“我……我还可以战斗。如果你需要的话，请不要犹豫，让这把利刃出鞘吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The time spent in the Dark City has left its mark on Kibellah. The life has left her eyes, her face is grim, and her skin has taken on a pale corpse-like pallor. Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗之城的遭遇在绮贝菈身上留下了烙印。她的目光已经失去了生机，表情无比严峻，皮肤宛如尸体一般苍白。在狂乱之中，她在皮肤上刻下了新的伤口，如今这些伤口已经肿胀、发炎。{/n}“我……我还可以战斗。如果你需要的话，请不要犹豫，让这把利刃出鞘吧。”

languages.text: {n}Die Zeit in der Dunklen Stadt hat Spuren bei Kibellah hinterlassen. Ihr Blick ist ohne Leben, ihr Gesicht grimmig, und ihre Haut ist leichenblass. Ihre rituellen Wunden, die sie im Wahn erneuert hat, sind angeschwollen und entzündet.{/n} "Ich ... ich kann kämpfen. Zögert nicht, diese Klinge aus der Scheide zu ziehen, wenn sie gebraucht wird."
languages.original_text: {n}The time spent in the Dark City has left its mark on Kibellah. The life has left her eyes, her face is grim, and her skin has taken on a pale corpse-like pallor. Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zeit in der Dunklen Stadt hat Spuren bei Kibellah hinterlassen. Ihr Blick ist ohne Leben, ihr Gesicht grimmig, und ihre Haut ist leichenblass. Ihre rituellen Wunden, die sie im Wahn erneuert hat, sind angeschwollen und entzündet.{/n} "Ich ... ich kann kämpfen. Zögert nicht, diese Klinge aus der Scheide zu ziehen, wenn sie gebraucht wird."

languages.text: {n}Le temps passé dans la Cité Crépusculaire a marqué Kibellah de son empreinte. Toute vie a quitté son regard, elle affiche une expression sinistre et sa peau a pris la pâleur mortelle d'un cadavre. Ses plaies rituelles, qu'elle a renouvelées dans un accès de frénésie, sont tuméfiées et enflammées.{/n} « Je... je suis tout à fait capable de me battre. N'hésitez pas à sortir votre lame de son fourreau en cas de besoin. »
languages.original_text: {n}The time spent in the Dark City has left its mark on Kibellah. The life has left her eyes, her face is grim, and her skin has taken on a pale corpse-like pallor. Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."

languages.text: {n}Kara Şehir'de geçirdiği günler, Kibellah'yı derinden etkilemiş. Gözlerindeki ışık sönmüş, suratı asık ve cildi ceset gibi soluk. Cinnet geçirdiği sırada yeniden açtığı ayin yaraları ise iltihaplanıp şişmiş.{/n} "Hâlâ... Hâlâ savaşabilirim. Lazımsa bu kılıcı kınından çıkarmaktan çekinme."
languages.original_text: {n}The time spent in the Dark City has left its mark on Kibellah. The life has left her eyes, her face is grim, and her skin has taken on a pale corpse-like pallor. Her ritual wounds, which she has renewed in a fit of frenzy, are swollen and inflamed.{/n} "I... I can fight. Do not hesitate to unsheathe this blade if it is needed."
